per_frame_init_1=db=0;
per_frame_init_2=dt=0;
per_frame_init_3=avgdb=bass-bass_att;
per_frame_init_4=avgdt=treb-treb_att;
per_frame_init_5=lbass=0;
per_frame_init_6=ltreb=0;
per_frame_init_7=
per_frame_init_8=avgbbeatrate=.5;
per_frame_init_9=beatb=0;
per_frame_init_10=beatb2=0;
per_frame_init_11=lbbtime2=time;
per_frame_init_12=rawbeatb=0;
per_frame_init_13=lbbtime=time;
per_frame_init_14=avgdb=.01;
per_frame_init_15=ph=0;
per_frame_init_16=phase=0;
per_frame_init_17=bool=0;
per_frame_init_18=const=.01;
per_frame_init_19=mtime=100+bass_att*1000;
per_frame_init_20=mtime2=100+treb_att*1000;
per_frame_init_21=mtime3=100+bass_att*1000;
per_frame_init_22=mtime4=100+treb_att*1000;
per_frame_init_23=
per_frame_init_24=
per_frame_init_25=
per_frame_init_26=trot=-.9;
per_frame_init_27=bc=0;
per_frame_init_28=c1=0;
per_frame_init_29=tx=0;
per_frame_init_30=ty=0;
per_frame_init_31=ccx=.5;
per_frame_init_32=ccy=.5;
per_frame_init_33=
per_frame_1=
per_frame_2=
per_frame_3=db=(bass-lbass)*fps;
per_frame_4=dt=(treb-ltreb)*fps;
per_frame_5=
per_frame_6=ltreb=treb;
per_frame_7=lbass=bass;
per_frame_8=
per_frame_9=
per_frame_10=avgdb=avgdb*.9+abs(db)*.1;
per_frame_11=avgdt=avgdt*.9+abs(dt)*.1;
per_frame_12=
per_frame_13=//beatdection
per_frame_14=rawbeatb=above((db),avgdb*2);
per_frame_15=beatb=rawbeatb*above(time-lbbtime,avgbbeatrate*.75);
per_frame_16=beatb2=beatb*above((dt),avgdb*1.5);
per_frame_17=beatbhard=beatb2*((db)-avgdb*3);
per_frame_18=
per_frame_19=//beatrate calc
per_frame_20=//avgbbeatrate=beatb2*(avgbbeatrate*.9+(time-lbbtime2)*.1)+(1-beatb2)*(avgbbeatrate+(3-avgbbeatrate)*.001);
per_frame_21=avgbbeatrate=beatb*(avgbbeatrate*.99+(time-lbbtime)*.01)+(1-beatb)*(avgbbeatrate+(3-avgbbeatrate)*.00001);
per_frame_22=
per_frame_23=lbbtime2=time*beatb2+(1-beatb2)*lbbtime2;
per_frame_24=lbbtime=time*beatb+(1-beatb)*lbbtime;
per_frame_25=
per_frame_26=ph=(time-lbbtime2)*(60/avgbbeatrate)*const;
per_frame_27=phase=max(min( ph, 1 ),0);
per_frame_28=const=const*(1-beatb2)+beatb2*( const+ (.001*bool) );
per_frame_29=bool=below(phase,.98)*(.99-ph)-above(phase,.98)*(ph*.5);
per_frame_30=
per_frame_31=bc=bc+beatb;
per_frame_32=
per_frame_33=mtime=mtime+(abs(dt)*.001+beatbhard*beatb2)*(1/fps);
per_frame_34=mtime2=mtime2+(abs(db)*.001+beatbhard*beatb2)*(1/fps);
per_frame_35=mtime3=mtime3+avgdt*.1*(1/fps);
per_frame_36=mtime4=mtime4+avgdb*.1*(1/fps);
per_frame_37=
per_frame_38=warp=0;
per_frame_39=
per_frame_40=
per_frame_41=decay=1;
per_frame_42=ob_a =.9+phase*.1;
per_frame_43=//mv_a = if(beat,1,0.05);
per_frame_44=//invert=above(sin(time*200),0);
per_frame_45=
per_frame_46=
per_frame_47=q1=rawbeatb;
per_frame_48=q2=beatbhard;
per_frame_49=q3=phase;
per_frame_50=q4=60/avgbbeatrate;
per_frame_51=q5=mtime-mtime4;
per_frame_52=q6=mtime3-mtime2;
per_frame_53=
per_frame_54=
per_frame_55=mv_r=sin(mtime2)*.5+.5;
per_frame_56=mv_g=sin(mtime4)*.4+.4;
per_frame_57=mv_b=sin(mtime3)*.5+.5;
per_frame_58=monitor=q6;
per_frame_59=
per_frame_60=c1=equal(bc%8,0);
per_frame_61=tx=tx*(1-c1)+c1*mtime*10;
per_frame_62=ty=ty*(1-c1)+c1*mtime2*10;
per_frame_63=
per_frame_64=trot=trot*(1-c1)+c1*(sin((mtime3+mtime4))+2);
per_frame_65=rot=trot;
per_frame_66=
per_frame_67=ccx=.5+sin(tx*.1)*.4;
per_frame_68=ccy=.5+sin(ty*.1)*.4;
per_frame_69=q7=ccx;
per_frame_70=q8=ccy;
per_frame_71=cx=ccx;
per_frame_72=cy=ccy;
per_pixel_1=dy = 0.005*sin(10*x+0.459*q6) + 0.005*sin(14*x+0.325*q6) + 0.005*sin(1.231*q8);
per_pixel_2=dx = 0.005*sin(9*y+0.612*q5) + 0.005*sin(13*y+0.429*q5) + 0.005*sin(1.027*q7);
per_pixel_3=
per_pixel_4=
per_pixel_5=crad=pow(pow((cy-y),2)+pow((cx-x),2),.5);
per_pixel_6=zoom=1+sin((q5+q6)+sin(1-q3+crad*3.14))*.01;
per_pixel_7=
per_pixel_8=rot=rot+sin(crad*3.14+q7)*1*sin(rot-q7);
per_pixel_9=//rot=0;
warp_1=`sampler sampler_fw_clouds;
warp_2=`shader_body
warp_3=`{// sample previous frame
warp_4=`ret = tex2D( sampler_main, uv ).xyz;
warp_5=`float blur =sin(bass*90)*rad;
warp_6=`ret=0.125*(
warp_7=`GetPixel(float2(uv.x-0.01*blur,uv.y-0.01*blur)) +
warp_8=`GetPixel(float2(uv.x+0.01*blur,uv.y+0.01*blur)) +
warp_9=`GetPixel(float2(uv.x-0.01*blur,uv.y+0.01*blur)) +
warp_10=`GetPixel(float2(uv.x+0.01*blur,uv.y-0.01*blur)) +
warp_11=`GetPixel(float2(uv.x,uv.y-0.01*blur)) +
warp_12=`GetPixel(float2(uv.x,uv.y+0.01*blur)) +
warp_13=`GetPixel(float2(uv.x-0.01*blur,uv.y)) +
warp_14=`GetPixel(float2(uv.x+0.01*blur,uv.y)));
warp_15=`//add a 'bass overbright' effect:
warp_16=`ret-=-(lum(ret)<sin(time*90))*ret*blur+(lum(ret)>sin(-time*90))*ret*blur;
warp_17=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`    float2 uv_echo = (uv - 0.5)*1.000*float2(-1,-1) + 0.5;
comp_4=`    float3 output =  tex2D(sampler_main, uv).xyz;
comp_5=`    float3 blur =  tex2D(sampler_main, GetBlur1(uv)).xyz;
comp_6=`    
comp_7=`   ret = blur;
comp_8=`
comp_9=`    ret *= 2.00; //gamma
comp_10=`    ret = 1 - ret;
comp_11=`}
